A

AbstractService - Class in icap.core
Abstract class silently providing all ICAP protocol parsing methods for both REQ and RESPMODE
Services implementation must just provide getResponse() and getOptions() methods
AbstractService(IcapServer, Socket) - Constructor for class icap.core.AbstractService
Default constructor.
accept(File, String) - Method in class tools.general.ClassPathLoader
Implementation of FilenameFilter Interface Filter profiles directory to retain only profiles files
